mapper.select: SELECT SEQ, ID, TITLE, CONTENT, WDATE, REF, DEL, G_CODE, SECRET FROM NA_QA ORDER BY REF DESC, SEQ DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NA_QA(SEQ, ID, TITLE, CONTENT, WDATE, REF, DEL, G_CODE, SECRET) VALUES(NA_SEQ_QA.NEXTVAL, #{id}, #{title}, #{content}, SYSDATE, (SELECT NVL(MAX(REF),0)+1 FROM NA_QA), 0, NULL, #{secret})
